Item API documentation version v1

http://github.com/sling-incubator/lsp-apis

Item API

This documents the API calls that can be made for items to fulfill circulation functionality

Items

Items services

/items get post

get

Return list of items

post

Create an Item

get /items

Return list of items

  • Request
  • Response

Headers

  • Authorization: required (string)

    Used to send a valid JWT token.

    Example:

    Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJzdWIiOiIxMjM0NTY3ODkwIiwibmFtZSI6IkpvaG4gRG9lIiwiYWRtaW4iOnRydWV9.TJVA95OrM7E2cBab30RMHrHDcEfxjoYZgeFONFh7HgQ

Query Parameters

  • offset: (integer - maximum: 1000)

    Skip over a number of elements by specifying an offset value for the query

  • limit: (integer - default: 10 - maximum: 100)

    Limit the number of elements returned in the response

    Example:

    10
  • orderBy: (string)

    Order by field: field A, field B

  • order: (one of desc, asc - default: desc)

    Order

  • query: (string)

    JSON array [{"field1","value1","operator1"},{"field2","value2","operator2"},...,{"fieldN","valueN","operatorN"}] with valid searchable fields: for example location

    Example:

    ["item_data.location.value", "STACK", "="]

HTTP status code 200

Returns a list of item items

Body

Type: application/json

Schema:

{"$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "item_data": {
      "type": "array",
      "items": {
        "type": "object",
        "properties": {
          "item_id": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "bib_id": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "barcode": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "location": {
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
              "value": {
                "type": "string"
              },
              "desc": {
                "type": "string"
              }
            }
          },
          "status": {
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
              "value": {
                "type": "string"
              },
              "desc": {
                "type": "string"
              }
            }
          },
          "material_type": {
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
              "value": {
                "type": "string"
              },
              "desc": {
                "type": "string"
              },
              "icon": {
                "type": "string"
              }
            }
          },
          "copy_id": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "item_link": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "shelf_location": {
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
              "classification_number": {
                "type": "string"
              },
              "shelf_listing_number": {
                "type": "string"
              }
            }
          }
        },
        "required": [
          "location",
          "status",
          "material_type",
          "item_link",
          "bib_id"
        ]
      }
    }
  },
  "required": [
    "item_data"
  ]
}

Example:

{
  "item_data": [
    {
      "item_id": "23344156380001021",
      "barcode": "39031031697261",
      "location": {
        "value": "STACK",
        "desc": "Stacks (STACK)"
      },
      "status": {
        "value": "01",
        "desc": "ITEM_STATUS_MISSING"
      },
      "material_type": {
        "value": "BOOK",
        "desc": "Book",
        "icon": "book.png"
      },
      "shelf_location": {
        "classification_number": "1234567890",
        "shelf_listing_number": "12345678"
      },
      "copy_id": "1",
      "item_link": "/bibs/99100383909999/item/1234567890009999",
      "bib_id": "99100383909999"
    }
  ]
}

HTTP status code 400

Bad request, e.g malformed request body or query parameter. Details of the error (e.g name of the parameter or line/character number with malformed data) provided in the response.

Body

Type: text/plain

Example:

unable to list items -- malformed parameter 'query', syntax error at column 6

HTTP status code 401

No valid token found

Body

Type: text/plain

Example:

Unauthorized

HTTP status code 403

Access denied not valid privilage in resurces

Body

Type: text/plain

Example:

Unauthorized

HTTP status code 500

Internal server error, e.g due to misconfiguration

Body

Type: text/plain

Example:

internal server error, contact administrator

post /items

Create an Item

  • Request
  • Response

Headers

  • Authorization: required (string)

    Used to send a valid JWT token.

    Example:

    Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJzdWIiOiIxMjM0NTY3ODkwIiwibmFtZSI6IkpvaG4gRG9lIiwiYWRtaW4iOnRydWV9.TJVA95OrM7E2cBab30RMHrHDcEfxjoYZgeFONFh7HgQ

Body

Type: application/json

Schema:

{"$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "item_data": {
      "type": "array",
      "items": {
        "type": "object",
        "properties": {
          "item_id": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "bib_id": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "barcode": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "location": {
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
              "value": {
                "type": "string"
              },
              "desc": {
                "type": "string"
              }
            }
          },
          "status": {
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
              "value": {
                "type": "string"
              },
              "desc": {
                "type": "string"
              }
            }
          },
          "material_type": {
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
              "value": {
                "type": "string"
              },
              "desc": {
                "type": "string"
              },
              "icon": {
                "type": "string"
              }
            }
          },
          "copy_id": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "item_link": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "shelf_location": {
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
              "classification_number": {
                "type": "string"
              },
              "shelf_listing_number": {
                "type": "string"
              }
            }
          }
        },
        "required": [
          "location",
          "status",
          "material_type",
          "item_link",
          "bib_id"
        ]
      }
    }
  },
  "required": [
    "item_data"
  ]
}

Example:

{
  "item_data": [
    {
      "barcode": "39031031697261",
      "location": {
        "value": "STACK",
        "desc": "Stacks (STACK)"
      },
      "status": {
        "value": "01",
        "desc": "ITEM_STATUS_MISSING"
      },
      "material_type": {
        "value": "BOOK",
        "desc": "Book",
        "icon": "book.png"
      },
      "shelf_location": {
        "classification_number": "1234567890",
        "shelf_listing_number": "12345678"
      },
      "copy_id": "1",
      "item_link": "/bibs/99100383909999/item/1234567890009999",
      "bib_id": "99100383909999"
    }
  ]
}

HTTP status code 201

Returns a newly created item, with server-controlled fields like 'id' populated

Headers

  • Location: (string)

    URI to the created item item

Body

Type: application/json

Example:

{
  "item_data": [
    {
      "item_id": "23344156380001021",
      "barcode": "39031031697261",
      "location": {
        "value": "STACK",
        "desc": "Stacks (STACK)"
      },
      "status": {
        "value": "01",
        "desc": "ITEM_STATUS_MISSING"
      },
      "material_type": {
        "value": "BOOK",
        "desc": "Book",
        "icon": "book.png"
      },
      "shelf_location": {
        "classification_number": "1234567890",
        "shelf_listing_number": "12345678"
      },
      "copy_id": "1",
      "item_link": "/bibs/99100383909999/item/1234567890009999",
      "bib_id": "99100383909999"
    }
  ]
}

HTTP status code 400

Bad request, e.g malformed request body or query parameter. Details of the error (e.g name of the parameter or line/character number with malformed data) provided in the response.

Body

Type: text/plain

Example:

"unable to add item -- malformed JSON at 13:3"

HTTP status code 401

No valid token found

Body

Type: text/plain

Example:

Unauthorized

HTTP status code 403

Access denied not valid privilage in resurces

Body

Type: text/plain

Example:

Unauthorized

HTTP status code 500

Internal server error, e.g. due to misconfiguration

Body

Type: text/plain

Example:

Internal server error, contact administrator

/items/{itemId} get delete put

Entity representing a item

get

Retrieve item item with given {itemId}

delete

Delete item item with given {itemId}

put

Update item item with given {itemId}

get /items/{itemId}

Retrieve item item with given {itemId}

  • Request
  • Response

URI Parameters

  • itemId: required (string)

Headers

  • Authorization: required (string)

    Used to send a valid JWT token.

    Example:

    Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJzdWIiOiIxMjM0NTY3ODkwIiwibmFtZSI6IkpvaG4gRG9lIiwiYWRtaW4iOnRydWV9.TJVA95OrM7E2cBab30RMHrHDcEfxjoYZgeFONFh7HgQ

Query Parameters

  • view: (string)

    displays a [brief] or [full] view of the returned entities - for example: show full view of the entities

HTTP status code 200

Returns item with a given ID

Body

Type: application/json

Schema:

{"$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "item_data": {
      "type": "array",
      "items": {
        "type": "object",
        "properties": {
          "item_id": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "bib_id": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "barcode": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "location": {
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
              "value": {
                "type": "string"
              },
              "desc": {
                "type": "string"
              }
            }
          },
          "status": {
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
              "value": {
                "type": "string"
              },
              "desc": {
                "type": "string"
              }
            }
          },
          "material_type": {
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
              "value": {
                "type": "string"
              },
              "desc": {
                "type": "string"
              },
              "icon": {
                "type": "string"
              }
            }
          },
          "copy_id": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "item_link": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "shelf_location": {
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
              "classification_number": {
                "type": "string"
              },
              "shelf_listing_number": {
                "type": "string"
              }
            }
          }
        },
        "required": [
          "location",
          "status",
          "material_type",
          "item_link",
          "bib_id"
        ]
      }
    }
  },
  "required": [
    "item_data"
  ]
}

Example:

{
  "item_data": [
    {
      "item_id": "23344156380001021",
      "barcode": "39031031697261",
      "location": {
        "value": "STACK",
        "desc": "Stacks (STACK)"
      },
      "status": {
        "value": "01",
        "desc": "ITEM_STATUS_MISSING"
      },
      "material_type": {
        "value": "BOOK",
        "desc": "Book",
        "icon": "book.png"
      },
      "shelf_location": {
        "classification_number": "1234567890",
        "shelf_listing_number": "12345678"
      },
      "copy_id": "1",
      "item_link": "/bibs/99100383909999/item/1234567890009999",
      "bib_id": "99100383909999"
    }
  ]
}

HTTP status code 401

No valid token found

Body

Type: text/plain

Example:

Unauthorized

HTTP status code 403

Access denied not valid privilage in resurces

Body

Type: text/plain

Example:

Unauthorized

HTTP status code 404

Item with a given ID not found

Body

Type: text/plain

Example:

"item not found"

HTTP status code 500

Internal server error, e.g. due to misconfiguration

Body

Type: text/plain

Example:

internal server error, contact administrator

delete /items/{itemId}

Delete item item with given {itemId}

  • Request
  • Response

URI Parameters

  • itemId: required (string)

Headers

  • Authorization: required (string)

    Used to send a valid JWT token.

    Example:

    Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJzdWIiOiIxMjM0NTY3ODkwIiwibmFtZSI6IkpvaG4gRG9lIiwiYWRtaW4iOnRydWV9.TJVA95OrM7E2cBab30RMHrHDcEfxjoYZgeFONFh7HgQ

HTTP status code 204

Item deleted successfully

HTTP status code 400

Bad request, e.g malformed request body or query parameter. Details of the error (e.g name of the parameter or line/character number with malformed data) provided in the response.

Body

Type: text/plain

Example:

"unable to delete item -- constraint violation"

put /items/{itemId}

Update item item with given {itemId}

  • Request
  • Response

URI Parameters

  • itemId: required (string)

Headers

  • Authorization: required (string)

    Used to send a valid JWT token.

    Example:

    Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJzdWIiOiIxMjM0NTY3ODkwIiwibmFtZSI6IkpvaG4gRG9lIiwiYWRtaW4iOnRydWV9.TJVA95OrM7E2cBab30RMHrHDcEfxjoYZgeFONFh7HgQ

Body

Type: application/json

Schema:

{"$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "item_data": {
      "type": "array",
      "items": {
        "type": "object",
        "properties": {
          "item_id": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "bib_id": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "barcode": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "location": {
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
              "value": {
                "type": "string"
              },
              "desc": {
                "type": "string"
              }
            }
          },
          "status": {
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
              "value": {
                "type": "string"
              },
              "desc": {
                "type": "string"
              }
            }
          },
          "material_type": {
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
              "value": {
                "type": "string"
              },
              "desc": {
                "type": "string"
              },
              "icon": {
                "type": "string"
              }
            }
          },
          "copy_id": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "item_link": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "shelf_location": {
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
              "classification_number": {
                "type": "string"
              },
              "shelf_listing_number": {
                "type": "string"
              }
            }
          }
        },
        "required": [
          "location",
          "status",
          "material_type",
          "item_link",
          "bib_id"
        ]
      }
    }
  },
  "required": [
    "item_data"
  ]
}

Example:

{
  "item_data": [
    {
      "item_id": "23344156380001021",
      "barcode": "39031031697261",
      "location": {
        "value": "STACK",
        "desc": "Stacks (STACK)"
      },
      "status": {
        "value": "01",
        "desc": "ITEM_STATUS_MISSING"
      },
      "material_type": {
        "value": "BOOK",
        "desc": "Book",
        "icon": "book.png"
      },
      "shelf_location": {
        "classification_number": "1234567890",
        "shelf_listing_number": "12345678"
      },
      "copy_id": "1",
      "item_link": "/bibs/99100383909999/item/1234567890009999",
      "bib_id": "99100383909999"
    }
  ]
}

HTTP status code 204

Item successfully updated

/items/{itemId}/fines get post

Collection of fine items.

get

Retrieve a list of fine items.

post

Create a new fine item.

get /items/{itemId}/fines

Retrieve a list of fine items.

  • Request
  • Response

URI Parameters

  • itemId: required (string)

Headers

  • Authorization: required (string)

    Used to send a valid JWT token.

    Example:

    Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJzdWIiOiIxMjM0NTY3ODkwIiwibmFtZSI6IkpvaG4gRG9lIiwiYWRtaW4iOnRydWV9.TJVA95OrM7E2cBab30RMHrHDcEfxjoYZgeFONFh7HgQ

Query Parameters

  • offset: (integer - maximum: 1000)

    Skip over a number of elements by specifying an offset value for the query

  • limit: (integer - default: 10 - maximum: 100)

    Limit the number of elements returned in the response

    Example:

    10
  • orderBy: (string)

    Order by field: field A, field B

  • order: (one of desc, asc - default: desc)

    Order

  • query: (string)

    JSON array [{"field1","value1","operator1"},{"field2","value2","operator2"},...,{"fieldN","valueN","operatorN"}] with valid searchable fields: for example lastname

    Example:

    ["fine_data.fine_amount", 400, "="]

HTTP status code 200

Returns a list of fine items

Body

Type: application/json

Schema:

{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "fine_data": {
      "type": "array",
      "items": {
        "type": "object",
        "properties": {
          "fine_amount": {
            "type": "integer"
          },
          "fine_outstanding": {
            "type": "integer"
          },
          "fine_date": {
            "type": "number"
          },
          "id": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "item_id": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "fine_pay_in_full": {
            "type": "boolean"
          },
          "fine_pay_in_partial": {
            "type": "boolean"
          },
          "fine_note": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "patron_id": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "fine_forgiven": {
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
              "user": {
                "type": "string"
              },
              "amount": {
                "type": "string"
              }
            }
          }
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "required": [
    "fine_data"
  ]
}

Example:

{
  "fine_data": [
    {
      "fine_amount": 400,
      "fine_outstanding": 100,
      "fine_date": 1413879432450,
      "id": "950645520000121",
      "fine_pay_in_full": false,
      "fine_pay_in_partial": true,
      "fine_note": "aaaaaa",
      "item_id": "12345",
      "patron_id": "1221212",
       "fine_forgiven": {
        "user": "the cool librarian",
        "amount": "none"
      }
    }
  ]
}

HTTP status code 400

Bad request, e.g malformed request body or query parameter. Details of the error (e.g name of the parameter or line/character number with malformed data) provided in the response.

Body

Type: text/plain

Example:

unable to list fines -- malformed parameter 'query', syntax error at column 6

HTTP status code 401

No valid token found

Body

Type: text/plain

Example:

Unauthorized

HTTP status code 403

Access denied not valid privilage in resurces

Body

Type: text/plain

Example:

Unauthorized

HTTP status code 500

Internal server error, e.g due to misconfiguration

Body

Type: text/plain

Example:

internal server error, contact administrator

post /items/{itemId}/fines

Create a new fine item.

  • Request
  • Response

URI Parameters

  • itemId: required (string)

Headers

  • Authorization: required (string)

    Used to send a valid JWT token.

    Example:

    Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJzdWIiOiIxMjM0NTY3ODkwIiwibmFtZSI6IkpvaG4gRG9lIiwiYWRtaW4iOnRydWV9.TJVA95OrM7E2cBab30RMHrHDcEfxjoYZgeFONFh7HgQ

Body

Type: application/json

Schema:

{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "fine_data": {
      "type": "array",
      "items": {
        "type": "object",
        "properties": {
          "fine_amount": {
            "type": "integer"
          },
          "fine_outstanding": {
            "type": "integer"
          },
          "fine_date": {
            "type": "number"
          },
          "id": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "item_id": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "fine_pay_in_full": {
            "type": "boolean"
          },
          "fine_pay_in_partial": {
            "type": "boolean"
          },
          "fine_note": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "patron_id": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "fine_forgiven": {
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
              "user": {
                "type": "string"
              },
              "amount": {
                "type": "string"
              }
            }
          }
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "required": [
    "fine_data"
  ]
}

Example:

{
  "fine_data": [
    {
      "fine_amount": 400,
      "fine_outstanding": 100,
      "fine_date": 1413879432450,
      "fine_pay_in_full": false,
      "fine_pay_in_partial": true,
      "fine_note": "aaaaaa",
      "item_id": "12345",
      "patron_id": "1221212",
       "fine_forgiven": {
        "user": "the cool librarian",
        "amount": "none"
      }
    }
  ]
}

HTTP status code 201

Returns a newly created item, with server-controlled fields like 'id' populated

Headers

  • Location: (string)

    URI to the created fine item

Body

Type: application/json

Example:

{
  "fine_data": [
    {
      "fine_amount": 400,
      "fine_outstanding": 100,
      "fine_date": 1413879432450,
      "id": "950645520000121",
      "fine_pay_in_full": false,
      "fine_pay_in_partial": true,
      "fine_note": "aaaaaa",
      "item_id": "12345",
      "patron_id": "1221212",
       "fine_forgiven": {
        "user": "the cool librarian",
        "amount": "none"
      }
    }
  ]
}

HTTP status code 400

Bad request, e.g malformed request body or query parameter. Details of the error (e.g name of the parameter or line/character number with malformed data) provided in the response.

Body

Type: text/plain

Example:

"unable to add fine -- malformed JSON at 13:3"

No valid token found

Type: text/plain

Example:

HTTP status code 500

Example:

/items/{itemId}/fines/{fineId} get delete put post

  • Retrieves the fine for a particular item id and fine id
  • Update a fine for a specific item
  • Delete fineId belonging to ItemId
  • Pay, waive, or dispute a fine
get

Retrieve fine item with given {fineId}

delete

Delete fine item with given {fineId}

put

Update fine item with given {fineId}

post

Applies the operation specified in the query parameter to a specific fine.

get /items/{itemId}/fines/{fineId}

Retrieve fine item with given {fineId}

  • Request
  • Response

URI Parameters

  • itemId: required (string)
  • fineId: required (string)

Headers

  • Authorization: required (string)

    Used to send a valid JWT token.

    Example:

    Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJzdWIiOiIxMjM0NTY3ODkwIiwibmFtZSI6IkpvaG4gRG9lIiwiYWRtaW4iOnRydWV9.TJVA95OrM7E2cBab30RMHrHDcEfxjoYZgeFONFh7HgQ

HTTP status code 200

Returns item with a given ID

Body

Type: application/json

Schema:

{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "fine_data": {
      "type": "array",
      "items": {
        "type": "object",
        "properties": {
          "fine_amount": {
            "type": "integer"
          },
          "fine_outstanding": {
            "type": "integer"
          },
          "fine_date": {
            "type": "number"
          },
          "id": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "item_id": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "fine_pay_in_full": {
            "type": "boolean"
          },
          "fine_pay_in_partial": {
            "type": "boolean"
          },
          "fine_note": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "patron_id": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "fine_forgiven": {
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
              "user": {
                "type": "string"
              },
              "amount": {
                "type": "string"
              }
            }
          }
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "required": [
    "fine_data"
  ]
}

Example:

{
  "fine_data": [
    {
      "fine_amount": 400,
      "fine_outstanding": 100,
      "fine_date": 1413879432450,
      "id": "950645520000121",
      "fine_pay_in_full": false,
      "fine_pay_in_partial": true,
      "fine_note": "aaaaaa",
      "item_id": "12345",
      "patron_id": "1221212",
       "fine_forgiven": {
        "user": "the cool librarian",
        "amount": "none"
      }
    }
  ]
}

post /items/{itemId}/fines/{fineId}

Applies the operation specified in the query parameter to a specific fine.

  • Request
  • Response

URI Parameters

  • itemId: required (string)
  • fineId: required (string)

Query Parameters

  • op: required (one of pay, waive, dispute - default: pay)

    Type of operation:

  • amount: required (string)

    Amount to pay against all current fines on patron

    Example:

    10
  • payment_method: required (string)

    Payment method used to make payment, ex. cash.

  • comment: (string)

    Short comment

HTTP status code 201

Returns a newly created item, with server-controlled fields like 'id' populated

Headers

  • Location: (string)

    URI to the created fine item

Body

Type: application/json

Schema:

{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "fine_data": {
      "type": "array",
      "items": {
        "type": "object",
        "properties": {
          "fine_amount": {
            "type": "integer"
          },
          "fine_outstanding": {
            "type": "integer"
          },
          "fine_date": {
            "type": "number"
          },
          "id": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "item_id": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "fine_pay_in_full": {
            "type": "boolean"
          },
          "fine_pay_in_partial": {
            "type": "boolean"
          },
          "fine_note": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "patron_id": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "fine_forgiven": {
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
              "user": {
                "type": "string"
              },
              "amount": {
                "type": "string"
              }
            }
          }
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "required": [
    "fine_data"
  ]
}

Example:

{
  "fine_data": [
    {
      "fine_amount": 400,
      "fine_outstanding": 100,
      "fine_date": 1413879432450,
      "id": "950645520000121",
      "fine_pay_in_full": false,
      "fine_pay_in_partial": true,
      "fine_note": "aaaaaa",
      "item_id": "12345",
      "patron_id": "1221212",
       "fine_forgiven": {
        "user": "the cool librarian",

      }

/items/{itemId}/requests get post

  • Retrieve a list of requests made on an item
  • Add a request for an item
get

Retrieve a list of request items.

post

Create a request for a specific item id

get /items/{itemId}/requests

Retrieve a list of request items.

  • Request
  • Response

URI Parameters

  • itemId: required (string)

Headers

  • Authorization: required (string)

    Used to send a valid JWT token.

    Example:

    Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJzdWIiOiIxMjM0NTY3ODkwIiwibmFtZSI6IkpvaG4gRG9lIiwiYWRtaW4iOnRydWV9.TJVA95OrM7E2cBab30RMHrHDcEfxjoYZgeFONFh7HgQ

Query Parameters

  • offset: (integer - maximum: 1000)

    Skip over a number of elements by specifying an offset value for the query

  • limit: (integer - default: 10 - maximum: 100)

    Limit the number of elements returned in the response

    Example:

    10
  • status: required (one of active, history - default: active)

    Return requests that are either only active (default) or history of all requests (anonymized requests will not be returned)

  • request_type: (one of HOLD, DIGITIZATION, BOOKING, ALL - default: ALL)

    Filter by a specific request type

HTTP status code 200

Returns a list of request items

Body

Type: application/json

Schema:

{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "item_request": {
      "type": "array",
      "items": {
        "type": "object",
        "properties": {
          "request_status": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "place_in_queue": {
            "type": "integer"
          },
          "request_date": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "request_type": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "request_id": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "pickup_location": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "item_id": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "bib_id": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "patron_id": {
            "type": "string"
          }
        },
        "required": [
          "request_id",
          "item_id",
          "patron_id"
        ]
      }
    },
    "total_record_count": {
      "type": "integer"
    }
  }
}

Example:

{
  "item_request": [
    {
      "request_status": "NOT_STARTED",
      "place_in_queue": 11,
      "request_date": "2015-12-12",
      "request_type": "HOLD|RECALL|MOVE|DIGITIZATION|BOOKING|ETC...",
      "pickup_location": "MATHLIB",
      "item_id": "23344156380001021",
      "bib_id": "13344156380001021",
      "patron_id": "Me123"
    }
  ],
  "total_record_count": 1
}

HTTP status code 400

Bad request, e.g malformed request body or query parameter. Details of the error (e.g name of the parameter or line/character number with malformed data) provided in the response.

Body

Type: text/plain

Example:

unable to list requests -- malformed parameter 'query', syntax error at column 6

          "item_id",
          "patron_id"
        ]
      }
    },
    "total_record_count": {
      "type": "integer"
    }
  }
}

Example:

{
  "item_request": [
    {
      "request_status": "NOT_STARTED",
      "place_in_queue": 11,
      "request_date": "2015-12-12",
      "request_type": "HOLD|RECALL|MOVE|DIGITIZATION|BOOKING|ETC...",
      "request_id": "00000000900111",
      "pickup_location": "MATHLIB",
      "item_id": "23344156380001021",
      "bib_id": "13344156380001021",
      "patron_id": "Me123"
    }
  ],
  "total_record_count": 1
}

HTTP status code 204

Item successfully updated

HTTP status code 400

Bad request, e.g malformed request body or query parameter. Details of the error (e.g name of the parameter or line/character number with malformed data) provided in the response.

Body

Type: text/plain

Example:

"unable to update request -- malformed JSON at 13:4"

HTTP status code 401

No valid token found

Body

Type: text/plain

Example:

Unauthorized

HTTP status code 403

Access denied not valid privilage in resurces

Body

Type: text/plain

Example:

Unauthorized

HTTP status code 404

Item with a given ID not found

Body

Type: text/plainn

Example:

"request not found"

HTTP status code 500

Internal server error, e.g. due to misconfiguration

Body

Type: text/plain

Example:

internal server error, contact administrator
